Nerangs.ab: ParagnaLL2.1.1 Var. a (Mss. K7, RJ, RKŠ):

ke barsom bandand se tā yā panǧ tā yā hafta tā barsom va aivyanghan dar dast gereftan čenān konand ke dast-e čab az barsom ǧodā nabāšad maḥalli ke avestā guyand aivanghan dar tak-e barsom bastan va avestā ḫᵛāndan xšnaoϑra ahurahe mazdā̊ aṣ̌əm vohū se fravarāne gāh ānče bid ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋᵛhatō xšnaoϑra tā marotū

"The ones who tie the barsom, they should take three, five, seven branches of the barsom and the aivyanghan in the right hand and make so that the left hand does not release the barsom. At the place where they recite the avestā, he should tie the aivyanghan at the bottom of the barsom and recite the following avestā: xšnaoϑra ahurahe mazdā̊, three Aṣ̌əm Vohūs, the Frauuarāne with the corresponding gāh and (the šnūman) ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋᵛhatō xšanoθra until mraotū."
ke barsom bandid xšnaōθra ahurahe mazdā̊ aṣ̌əm vohū se frauuarāne gāh ānke bid ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋᵛhatō xšnaoϑra yas. v. x. f. yaθā ahū vairiiō zaōtā tā sar goftan bon-e barsom bastan

"When you tie the barsom, one should recite xšnaoϑra ahurahe mazdā̊, three Aṣ̌əm Vohūs, the Frauuarāne with the corresponding gāh and (the šnūman) ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋᵛhatō xšanoθra y. v. x. f. and yaθā ahū vairiiō zaōtā until the end. He should tie the bottom of the barsom."

ke barsam bandan se tā yā panǧ tā yā haft tā barsom avanghen dar dast gereftan cenān konand ke dast-e cap az barsomdān bāšad maḥalli ke avestā guyad avanghan dar tak-e barsom bastan avestā ḫᵛāndan xšnaōθra ahurahe mazdā̊ aṣ̌əm vohū frauuarāne gāh ānce bid ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō x́arənaŋhatō xšnaoϑra OD marotū.

"When he should tie the barsom, he should take in the hand, three, five or seven barsom-twigs so that they are to the left side of the barsomdān. At the place where they recite the avestā, he should tie the avanghan at the bottom of the barsom and recite the following avestā: xšnaoϑra ahurahe mazdā̊, three Aṣ̌əm Vohūs, the Frauuarāne with the corresponding gāh and (the šnūman) ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋᵛhatō xšanoθra until mraotū."

Quotations.ab: ka andar yazišn-ē barsom cīnēd ud bandēd aṣ̌əm vohū sē frauuarānē čē gāh dārēd ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋhatō xšnaōθra tā frasastaiiaēca u-š wāz az zōt frāz gīrišn ud abāz ō abestāg pad rāspīgīh estišn.

"If he cuts and ties the barsom for the permance of a yazišn, (then he should recite) three Aṣ̌əm Vohūs and the Frauurāne with the corresponding gāh and (the šnūman) ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋhatō xšnaōθra until frasastaiiaēca."
